results.definition: a smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked; often served on a bread roll
characterized by directness in manner or speech; without subtlety or evasion
examples: tell me what you think--and you may just as well be frank

results.definition: stamp with a postmark to indicate date and time of mailing
a member of the ancient Germanic peoples who spread from the Rhine into the Roman Empire in the 4th century
exempt by means of an official pass or letter, as from customs or other checks
